OAQ Library Workflow Docs

OAQ is a web-based tool that helps publishers create author questionnaires and creates structured data from author responses. You can read more about the project on the Harvard Library portal.

SECTIONS
» Account Management
» Organizations
» Responses

Welcome to OAQ!

The documentation you are reading is intended for library staff in organization admin or staff roles. If you have questions about this documentation, please write to oaq@fas.harvard.edu and we’ll be happy to help.

Need help? Contact oaq@fas.harvard.edu.
